alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Grant; La Salle; Natchitoches; Sabine; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 5:21PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills below +9 degrees. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northwest Louisiana and east Texas. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Grant; La Salle; Natchitoches; Sabine; Winn
